title: The Iron-Widow's Silk
description: The 'Black-Forge' is being choked by a silver, metallic silk that's harder than steel. The Widow is hungry.

turns.narrative: The forge's furnace is a dim, cooling orange. Thick, glistening strands of 'Iron-Silk' are wrapped around the bellows, pulsing with a slow, metallic heartbeat.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You snap a minor strand, but your hand is stained with cold mercury. (+1 Progress)
turns.choice_b: Heat the silk with a blowtorch
turns.consequence_b: Success: The silk resists the heat, absorbing the energy. (+1 Lore)
turns.convergence: A series of clicking sounds echoes from the rafters—something large is moving up there.

turns.narrative: An 'Iron-Widow'—a spider-construct the size of a shield, made of bolted plates—descends on a single, heavy thread. Its eyes are red-hot embers.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You roll beneath the anvil, the Widow's legs striking the floor with a heavy 'thud'. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: The Widow's fangs leave deep gashes in your wood. (+100 XP)
turns.convergence: The Widow retreats to the ceiling, trailing a web that is beginning to conduct the forge's remaining heat toward its nest.

turns.narrative: The heat is being sucked out of the room. The Widow's nest—a massive sphere of silk above the furnace—is starting to glow white-hot.
turns.choice_a: Target the nest with a water-bomb (Dex DC 14)
turns.consequence_a: Success: The steam explosion disrupts the silk. (+1 Progress)
turns.choice_b: Cut the widow's support thread (Attack DC 14)
turns.consequence_b: Success: The construct falls into the cooling furnace. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: A swarm of 'Spiderlings'—tiny, clicking gear-bugs—pours out of the silk vents.

turns.narrative: The Spiderlings are everywhere, trying to crawl into the gaps of your armor. They smell of hot oil and charcoal.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You crush scores of them. (+100 XP)
turns.consequence_b: Success: The tiny automatons freeze and drop. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The Iron-Widow rises from the furnace, its plates now glowing a dangerous bright-orange.

turns.narrative: The Widow is superheated. Its very presence is making the metal tools on the wall begin to soften and sag.
turns.choice_a: Lure it to the cooling-tank (Str DC 14)
turns.consequence_a: Success: You position yourself so it charges toward the water. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: The thermal shock cracks its carapace. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The Widow hits the water with a deafening hiss, filling the room with blinding steam.

turns.narrative: In the white mist, you can only see the glowing red eyes of the Widow. It's moving slower, but its silk is now steaming and toxic.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You maintain your breath through the vapor. (+100 XP)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You anticipate its next lunge. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: You catch the Widow's main gear-joint in a vice-like grip.

turns.narrative: The construct is struggling, its hydraulic fluid leaking like dark blood onto the floor.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You sever the head-piece. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You salvage the 'Widow's Heart-Gear'. (+1 Loot)
turns.convergence: The main construct goes silent, but the silk nest above is still humming.

turns.narrative: The 'Heart' of the Widow was just one part of the web. The silk is now vibrating in a specific frequency—a distress signal.
turns.choice_a: Muffle the signal with sand (Repair DC 12)
turns.consequence_b: Success: It's pointing to the 'Main Cog-Works' in the High-Ward. (+1 Lore)
turns.convergence: The Blacksmith enters, looking at the wreckage of his forge with a mixture of horror and awe.

turns.narrative: The Blacksmith offers you his 'Master-Work Hammer' in exchange for the silk you've cleared.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You gain a weapon that can repair as well as destroy. (+1 Gear)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You gain material for superior armor. (+1 Gear)
turns.convergence: The furnace is relit. The fire burns steady and blue.

turns.narrative: As you leave, you see a small, silver strand trailing from your boot. The silk is persistent.
turns.consequence_b: Success: It pulses when constructed objects are near. (+1 Luck)

conclusion: The Iron-Widow has been dismantled, and the Black-Forge is back in production. But the signal it sent suggests a 'Mother-Widow' may be waiting in the foundations.

risk_matrix.penalty: Forge stays cold. -5 Resources and -2 to all future 'Gear-Repair' rolls.
risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor consequences.
